sourcesContent:
// a react component for the dashboard screen of the mess manager app // - this is the screen that is displayed when the user is logged in // - this screen displays the current user's name, the current date, and the current time // - this screen also displays the current user's current meal plan's meals' items ingredients import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "./dashboard-cards.css"; function Dashboard() { const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { error, loading, userInfo } = userLogin; const [dateState, setDateState] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => setDateState(new Date()), 1000); }, []); return (

Welcome

{/*

{userInfo.name}

*/}
Today's Date : {dateState.toLocaleDateString()}
Today's time :{" "} {dateState.toLocaleTimeString({ hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", hour12: true, })}
{/* today's menu */}
Whats on Today

Lunch

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
  • Vestibulum at eros

Dinner

{new Date().toLocaleDateString({ day: "numeric", month: "short", year: "numeric", })}
  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
  • Vestibulum at eros
{/* table for this month's bill */}
Your Bill
{/* download pdf button */}
# Month Total Paid Due
0 March 4000
1 Fabruary 4000 0 4000
2 May 3600 400 3400
3 June 4400 0 4400
{/* section for feedback to the admin */}
Give Feedback
); } export default Dashboard;
